alert.note: Alert for Bath; Estill; Fleming; Menifee; Montgomery; Powell; Rowan (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 12:16PM EDT until June 17 at 1:00PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in JACKSON KY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Powell County in east central Kentucky... Montgomery County in east central Kentucky... Bath County in east central Kentucky... Northern Estill County in east central Kentucky... Western Menifee County in east central Kentucky... Fleming County in east central Kentucky... Western Rowan County in east central Kentucky... * Until 100 PM EDT. * At 1215 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 11 miles west of Fairview to near Sideview to near Winchester, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Sharpsburg around 1225 PM EDT. Flat Creek around 1230 PM EDT. Fairview around 1235 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Owingsville, Stanton and Flemingsburg. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Heavy rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Bath; Estill; Fleming; Menifee; Montgomery; Powell; Rowan
